abstract: Progress is reported in allowing an oversight board to inspect auditing firms in China whose clients issue securities traded in public markets in the United States.
snippet: Progress is reported in allowing an oversight board to inspect auditing firms in China whose clients issue securities traded in public markets in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The chairman of the United States regulator that inspects audit firms — an agency that has been frustrated by its inability to review audits of Chinese companies that turned out to be frauds — said Tuesday that he expected that his staff would soon be able to sit in on Chinese inspections of auditors.

headline.main: Regulator Predicts U.S. Will Soon Take Part in Chinese Inspections of Auditors
headline.print_headline: Regulator Predicts U.S. Will Soon Take Part in Chinese Inspections of Auditors

abstract: The Federal Reserve opened the door for China’s biggest bank to establish a presence in the United States on Wednesday, allowing the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to buy an American institution.
snippet: The Federal Reserve opened the door for China’s biggest bank to establish a presence in the United States on Wednesday, allowing the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to buy an American institution.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve opened the door for China’s biggest bank to establish a presence in the United States on Wednesday, allowing the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to take a majority stake in an American institution.

headline.main: Fed Approves I.C.B.C.’s Takeover of Bank of East Asia

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
